text: If I’ve updated the main branch on github of a package that’s in the registry, how long will it take to show up when people do an update?

elements.text: If I’ve updated the main branch on github of a package that’s in the registry, how long will it take to show up when people do an update?

text: You need to register the new version for users to get this update

elements.text: You need to register the new version for users to get this update

text: JuliaRegistrator merges new versions every 15 minutes

elements.text: JuliaRegistrator merges new versions every 15 minutes

text: <@UM30MT6RF> - do I just go through the same process as the first time to register the update?

elements.text: - do I just go through the same process as the first time to register the update?

text: You just need to comment with `@JuliaRegistrator register` on an issue or the commit you want to register

elements.text: You just need to comment with `@JuliaRegistrator register` on an issue or the commit you want to register
